summary: The given code uses the xmltodict library to parse an XML message containing Bilibili video sharing information, then prints its details. The "print_xml_message" function handles exceptions during parsing and printing.

details.comment: This code represents an XML message with various attributes and data for sharing a Bilibili video on QQ. It contains the template ID, URL to share the video, service ID, action type and data, brief description of the shared content, and more specific details about the item being shared, such as its cover image and title.
details.content:

details.comment: The code defines a function called "print_xml_message" that takes in an XML message and prints it. It uses the xmltodict library to parse the XML message into a Python dictionary format, then iterates over each element in the dictionary and prints its text content. The code also handles any potential exceptions that may occur during parsing or printing of the XML message.
